Title: Windows Phone and Windows Store app utility routines and helper libraries
Description: This project provides free utilities (code routines) and helper classes for Windows Phone 8 and Windows 8/8.1 Store app developers using C# and XAML.
HomeWiki:
Project

Windows Phone 8 and Windows 8/8.1 Store Application Helper Libraries for C#/XAML

Description

This project contains a small set of useful helper libraries that make the development of your Windows Phone 8 and Windows 8/8.1 Store applications easier. The set of available routines will expand over time.

Enjoy!

Regards,

Jani Järvinen
